Assets

render

public static function render ($assets =  '',
$format =  null,
$type =  null)

assets() will accept an comma separated string of files that will relate to bundle files in the tentacle admin folder, as well as an output format for normal or minify and asset type.

assets() will be passed a comma separated string from the load::view that sets the header file.

Parameters

$assetsstring
$formatnull
$typeJavaScript or CSS

Returns

$asset_listHTML

See Also

HTML
